FEATURES.TITLE: The funny thing is, it actually works.

MANAGE.TITLE: Manage
MANAGE.DESCRIPTION: A more easily and better way to manage your client and payment.

INFORM.TITLE: Inform
INFORM.DESCRIPTION: Send a message to your clients at any time by mail, SMS, whatsapp...

SCHEDULE.TITLE: Schedule
SCHEDULE.DESCRIPTION: Handle the gym schedule easily. Add training sessions and different events in few clicks.

STATS.TITLE: Stats
STATS.DESCRIPTION: Get a lot of kind of stats about your gym like, new clients per week, how many clients has come, the peak of attendance.

CLOSE.TITLE: Close to the gym
CLOSE.DESCRIPTION: Keep your client close to the gym thanks to extra features and our smartphone application.

BUSINESS.TITLE: Business
BUSINESS.DESCRIPTION: Keep a record of all your client payments.

MUSIC.TITLE: Music
MUSIC.DESCRIPTION: Let your client manage the music in the gym when they are here! More fun!
